properties.name: externalId
properties.description: The field to check to see if the account already exists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: externalIdValue
properties.description: If this value exists in the 'match against' field, update the account. Otherwise create a new one.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the account. Maximum size is 255 characters.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Account number assigned to this account (not the unique ID). Maximum size is 40 characters.

options.name: accountNumber
options.description: Account number assigned to this account (not the unique ID). Maximum size is 40 characters.

options.name: annualRevenue
options.description: Estimated annual revenue of the account

options.name: accountSource
options.description: The source of the account record. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: billingCity
options.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 40 characters.

options.name: billingCountry
options.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 80 characters.

options.name: billingPostalCode
options.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 20 characters.

options.name: billingState
options.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 80 characters.

options.name: billingStreet
options.description: Street address for the billing address of this account

properties.name: accountId
properties.description: ID of account that needs to be fetched

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Account number assigned to this account (not the unique ID). Maximum size is 40 characters.

options.name: accountNumber
options.description: Account number assigned to this account (not the unique ID). Maximum size is 40 characters.

options.name: accountSource
options.description: The source of the account record. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: annualRevenue
options.description: Estimated annual revenue of the account

options.name: billingCity
options.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 40 characters.

options.name: billingCountry

options.name: billingPostalCode
options.description: Details for the billing address of this account. Maximum size is 20 characters.

options.name: billingState

options.description: Street address for the billing address of this account

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Fields to include separated by ,

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to include separated by ,

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of the note

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Add note to an account

options.name: Add Note
options.description: Add note to an account

options.name: Create
options.description: Create an account

options.name: Create or Update
options.description: Create a new account, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an account

options.name: Get
options.description: Get an account

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many accounts

options.name: Get Summary
options.description: Returns an overview of account's metadata

options.name: Update
options.description: Update an account

properties.name: attachmentId
properties.description: ID of attachment that needs to be fetched

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of case. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: caseId
properties.description: ID of case that needs to be fetched

properties.name: lastname
properties.description: Required. Last name of the contact. Limited to 80 characters.

properties.name: contactId
properties.description: ID of contact that needs to be fetched

properties.name: campaignId
properties.description: ID of the campaign that needs to be fetched. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: customObject
properties.description: Name of the custom object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: customFieldsUi
properties.description: Filter by custom fields

properties.name: recordId
properties.description: Record ID to be updated

properties.name: apiName
properties.description: Required. API name of the flow.

properties.name: jsonParameters
properties.description: Whether the input variables should be set via the value-key pair UI or JSON/RAW

properties.name: variablesJson
properties.description: Input variables as JSON object

properties.name: variablesUi
properties.description: The input variable to send

properties.name: company
properties.description: Company of the lead. If person account record types have been enabled, and if the value of Company is null, the lead converts to a person account.

properties.name: leadId
properties.description: ID of Lead that needs to be fetched

properties.name: closeDate
properties.description: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close.

properties.name: stageName
properties.description: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: opportunityId
properties.description: ID of opportunity that needs to be fetched

properties.name: query
properties.description: A SOQL query. An example query parameter string might look like: “SELECT+Name+FROM+MyObject”. If the SOQL query string is invalid, a MALFORMED_QUERY response is returned.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The current status of the task, such as In Progress or Completed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: taskId
properties.description: ID of task that needs to be fetched

properties.name: userId
properties.description: ID of user that needs to be fetched

properties.name: authentication
properties.description: OAuth Authorization Flow

properties.name: resource
properties.description: Represents an individual account, which is an organization or person involved with your business (such as customers, competitors, and partners)

options.name: Account
options.description: Represents an individual account, which is an organization or person involved with your business (such as customers, competitors, and partners)

options.name: Attachment
options.description: Represents a file that a has uploaded and attached to a parent object

options.name: Case
options.description: Represents a case, which is a customer issue or problem

options.name: Contact
options.description: Represents a contact, which is an individual associated with an account

options.name: Custom Object
options.description: Represents a custom object

options.name: Document
options.description: Represents a document

options.name: Flow
options.description: Represents an autolaunched flow

options.name: Lead
options.description: Represents a prospect or potential

options.name: Opportunity
options.description: Represents an opportunity, which is a sale or pending deal

options.name: Search
options.description: Search records

options.name: Task
options.description: Represents a business activity such as making a phone call or other to-do items. In the user interface, and records are collectively referred to as activities.

options.name: User
options.description: Represents a person, which is one user in system
